# GET /v1/gameCenterActivityVersions/{id}/relationships/defaultImage | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterActivityVersions/{id}/relationships/defaultImage ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivityversions-_id_-relationships-defaultimage)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterActivityVersions/{id}/relationships/defaultImage 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterActivityVersions/{id}/relationships/defaultImage

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivityversions-_id_-relationships-defaultimage#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterActivityVersions/{id}/relationships/defaultImage
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivityversions-_id_-relationships-defaultimage#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivityversions-_id_-relationships-defaultimage#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterActivityVersionDefaultImageLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenteractivityversiondefaultimagelinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivityversions-_id_-relationships-defaultimage#see-also)

### [Read, create, and update Game Center activity versions](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivityversions-_id_-relationships-defaultimage#Read-create-and-update-Game-Center-activity-versions)

[`Read the versions for an activity`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivities-_id_-versions)Get a list of versions for a specific Game Center activity.[`GET /v1/gameCenterActivities/{id}/relationships/versions`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivities-_id_-relationships-versions)[`Read activity version information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivityversions-_id_)Get information for a specific Game Center activity version.[`Read default image information for an activity version`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivityversions-_id_-defaultimage)Get details about the default image for a specific Game Center activity version.[`List all localizations for an activity version`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivityversions-_id_-localizations)Get details about the default localization for a specific Game Center activity version.[`GET /v1/gameCenterActivityVersions/{id}/relationships/localizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenteractivityversions-_id_-relationships-localizations)[`Add an activity version release`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-gamecenteractivityversionreleases)Add a version release for a specific Game Center activity.[`Create an activity version`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-gamecenteractivityversions)Add an activity to a Game Center detail, group, or leaderboard.[`Modify an activity version`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenteractivityversions-_id_)Update a specific activity version.
